languages.text: "Тогда ты подаришь тысячи душ Сай'лантреш, элантах! Ранишь одного врага, дабы напитать силой второго. Когда Та, Что Жаждет, закончит свой пир в Комморре, она непременно запустит когти и в твои миры. Ибо ненасытности ее нет предела".

"Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."
languages.original_text: "Тогда ты подаришь тысячи душ Сай'лантреш, элантах! Ранишь одного врага, дабы напитать силой второго. Когда Та, Что Жаждет, закончит свой пир в Комморре, она непременно запустит когти и в твои миры. Ибо ненасытности ее нет предела".

traits.locale_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

"Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

"Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

"Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

"Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

"Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

languages.text: « Vous offrirez des milliers d'âmes à Sai'lanthresh, elantach ! Vous blesserez un ennemi pour en renforcer un autre. Et lorsque l'Assoiffée aura fini de festoyer à Commorragh, elle ne manquera pas de planter ses griffes dans vos mondes. Car rien ne pourra jamais assouvir sa faim. »
languages.original_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

traits.locale_text: « Vous offrirez des milliers d'âmes à Sai'lanthresh, elantach ! Vous blesserez un ennemi pour en renforcer un autre. Et lorsque l'Assoiffée aura fini de festoyer à Commorragh, elle ne manquera pas de planter ses griffes dans vos mondes. Car rien ne pourra jamais assouvir sa faim. »

languages.text: “那你就会把成千上万的灵魂交给赛·兰斯雷什，外界人！虽然你打击了其中一个敌人，但却增强了另一个敌人的力量。一旦饥渴女士在整个科摩罗大肆欢宴之后，她肯定会把爪子伸向你们的世界，因为这里已经没有任何东西能满足她的饥渴了。”
languages.original_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

traits.locale_text: “那你就会把成千上万的灵魂交给赛·兰斯雷什，外界人！虽然你打击了其中一个敌人，但却增强了另一个敌人的力量。一旦饥渴女士在整个科摩罗大肆欢宴之后，她肯定会把爪子伸向你们的世界，因为这里已经没有任何东西能满足她的饥渴了。”

languages.text: 「エランタ、そうなれば千もの魂をセランスレッシュに捧げることになるぞ！一人の敵に傷を負わせても、別の敵に力を与えることになる。〈かの渇きたる女〉がコモラフでの宴を終えれば、必ずやあなたたちの世界にも牙をむくだろう。彼女の飢えを満たすものはないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、そうなれば千もの魂をセランスレッシュに捧げることになるぞ！一人の敵に傷を負わせても、別の敵に力を与えることになる。〈かの渇きたる女〉がコモラフでの宴を終えれば、必ずやあなたたちの世界にも牙をむくだろう。彼女の飢えを満たすものはないのだ」

languages.text: "Dann werdet Ihr Sai'lanthresh Tausende von Seelen übergeben, Elantach! Ihr verwundet quasi einen Feind, nur um einen anderen damit zu verstärken. Sobald Sie, die dürstet, fertig ist mit Commorragh, wird sie mit ihren Klauen auch nach Euren Welten greifen. Denn nichts stillt ihren Hunger."
languages.original_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werdet Ihr Sai'lanthresh Tausende von Seelen übergeben, Elantach! Ihr verwundet quasi einen Feind, nur um einen anderen damit zu verstärken. Sobald Sie, die dürstet, fertig ist mit Commorragh, wird sie mit ihren Klauen auch nach Euren Welten greifen. Denn nichts stillt ihren Hunger."

languages.text: «¡Eso entregaría miles de almas a Sai'lanthresh, elantach! Herirías a un enemigo para fortalecer a otro. Y cuando la Sedienta terminase de devorar Commorragh, también hundiría sus garras en tus mundos. Porque nada puede saciar su voracidad».
languages.original_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso entregaría miles de almas a Sai'lanthresh, elantach! Herirías a un enemigo para fortalecer a otro. Y cuando la Sedienta terminase de devorar Commorragh, también hundiría sus garras en tus mundos. Porque nada puede saciar su voracidad».

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh'e binlerce ruh vermiş olursun elantach! Bir düşmanını yaralarken bir diğerini güçlendirirsin. Susayan, Commorragh'ta ziyafet çektikten sonra pençelerini kaçınılmaz olarak senin dünyalarına da uzatır çünkü onun açılığını hiçbir şey yatıştıramaz."
languages.original_text: "Then you will give thousands of souls to Sai'lanthresh, elantach! You will wound one enemy to empower another. Once She Who Thirsts is done feasting in Commorragh, she will surely sink her claws into your worlds as well. Because nothing can sate her hunger."

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh'e binlerce ruh vermiş olursun elantach! Bir düşmanını yaralarken bir diğerini güçlendirirsin. Susayan, Commorragh'ta ziyafet çektikten sonra pençelerini kaçınılmaz olarak senin dünyalarına da uzatır çünkü onun açılığını hiçbir şey yatıştıramaz."
